title: Just a quick "thank you guys!!" for the God-King Garen skin :-)
body:
I ... I ... don't know what to say!

Here I am, coming back to league after...well, almost a year...and the first thing I see is this.

A skin for Garen. But not just any skin. A God-Skin.

I love you.

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}} 

Have my money on Monday when Shops are open so I can buy another Paysafe card!

replies.body: I don't play Garen these days but I agree - it's an awesome looking skin. I'm so jelly. If only there was a God-King Heimerdinger!

> [{quoted}](name=Blaene,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ATEn9Oxa,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-07-28T17:19:57.595+0000)
>
> I don't play Garen these days but I agree - it's an awesome looking skin. I'm so jelly. If only there was a God-King Heimerdinger!

godmerdinger

> [{quoted}](name=Carnival Knights,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ATEn9Oxa,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2018-07-30T17:26:13.477+0000)
>
> godmerdinger

Well, there's no going back now :-)

http://leaguememe.com/uploads/league/4192893817.jpg

>If only there was a God-King Heimerdinger!

If they do that, I am gonna build them a shrine and start a cult ;-)
It's hard to imagine a better skin for Garen.
